name: Globe
slogan: Trade perpetual futures with Bitcoin collateral

jobs.title: Institutional Sales Executive
jobs.description:
Description
Globe Derivative Trading is a digital asset derivative exchange with group offices across the US, UK and Seychelles. It is launching later this year and offers highly in-demand perpetual swap contracts on crypto exchange rates and volatility-related products. 

In this role you will work together with the executive team to build partnerships with businesses that trade (or are otherwise involved with the trading of) cryptocurrency derivative products in order to help grow trading volumes on the exchange and launch and beyond. 

This will involve phone, video, email and potentially face-to-face conversations with such businesses, often based in Asia across Japan, Korea and Singapore and with offices across Europe and the USA. You’ll also work to better understand their needs and motivations, design sales pipelines and help improve our understanding of such businesses. 
Objectives
●	Build relationships with businesses trading cryptocurrency derivatives following classic B2B sales pipelines 
●	Design market research campaigns to better understand the needs and motivations of such companies 
●	Ad-hoc market research associated with such companies 
Essential
●	B2B sales pipeline construction experience 
●	Ability to empathise and discover pain points suffered by heads of trading and to build partnerships with them 
●	Hustle and initiative 
Desirable
●	Familiarity with exchange-traded financial products like futures, options, swaps 
●	Sales experience with hedge funds, banks, pension funds, block-trading platforms, high frequency trading firms and other financial institutions 
●	Spoken Korean, Japanese or Chinese 

Opportunities available in London

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
As a frontend developer, you will develop trading user interfaces using react/redux and build websites around these

You will find a balance between the work of our designers and your own artistic vision balancing implementation time, performance characteristics and creating an engaging experience for the people who use it

Objectives
●	Develop a best-in-class user experience for hedge funds, HFTs and smaller traders alike 
●	Connect with customers who use the product 
●	Grow alongside an exciting team of finance industry experts, scientists and quants

Essential
●	Exceptional software development skills evidenced through open source contributions or work history 
●	Core technologies: JavaScript (react/redux), HTML/CSS 
●	Strong communication skills 
●	Pragmatic, iterative approach to getting things done

Desirable
●	Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Electrical Engineering or similar 
●	Experience with RxJS
●	Rust, C++, assembly or other low level programming experience 
●	Experience trading futures, options and cryptocurrencies 
●	Japanese and Korean cultural sensitivity and language capability 

Job placement is with our Group Company Fifth Row Technologies. Initially remote but eventually in London.

jobs.title: Cloud Engineer
jobs.description:
As a cloud engineer, you will take responsibility for building and operating our cloud infrastructure on AWS. You will work closely with a team of former high frequency traders, technologists from banks and exchanges and quants to build a platform suitable for the throughput, latency and security needs of a modern derivatives exchange 

Objectives
●	Build performant, scalable and secure cloud instructure 
●	Grow alongside an exciting team of finance industry experts, scientists and quants 

Essential
●	Exceptional software development skills evidenced through open source contributions or work history 
●	Core technologies: terraform/aws 
●	SRE/DevOps experience in a linux environment (Ubuntu, RHEL) 
●	Strong communication skills 
●	Pragmatism to handle the needs and manage expectations of other technologists

Desirable
●	Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Electrical Engineering or similar 
●	Passion for infrastructure as code 
●	Network analysis experience 
●	Rust, C++, assembly or other low level programming experience 
●	Familiarity with kdb/q and traditional SQL databases 
●	Experience with highly available and scalable architectures 
●	Experience with cloud connectivity to colocation data centers 
●	Experience trading futures, options and cryptocurrencies 

Job is with our Group Company, Fifth Row Technologies, based in London.
